column2: Sales start on Wednesday 15 July until 11 August for a period of 4 weeks. You have until Sunday 12 July at 11:59 pm to update your offers by API. After this date we no longer guarantee the visibility of your offers on sale for Wednesday to 8:00 am.
We meet currently a problem to update offers by API from S28. This error message appears: Stock: Not enough stock compared to pending orders. Our technical teams are mobilized on the subject.
